channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 17:11 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire. Walk into shelter!
item.description: 🔴 17:11 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire. Walk into shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
